channel.title: CVE Feed for nattywp -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nattywp -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5788|2024-08-01T21:18:07.070Z -- nattywp -- silesia
item.description: The Silesia theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘link’ attribute within the theme's Button shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
